mapper.select: SELECT /* BannerMapper.xml, searchRecommendProdList, tae hee Lee, 2014-02-21 */ IA.PART_PROD_ID , IB.TOP_MENU_ID FROM (SELECT B.PART_PROD_ID FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID, B.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.LIST_ID = #{recommendId} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(B.STD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = #{stdDt} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT ) A /* 운영자 임의 추천 */ , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD C /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D /* 채널 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND D.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' UNION SELECT D.PART_PROD_ID FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID, B.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.LIST_ID = #{recommendId} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(B.STD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = #{stdDt} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT ) A /* 운영자 임의 추천 */ , TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG B /* 쇼핑 카탈로그 */ , TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG C /* 카탈로그-상품 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP D /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD E /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD F /* 채널 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.CATALOG_ID AND B.CATALOG_ID = C.CATALOG_ID AND C.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = F.TENANT_ID AND C.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND NVL(B.CHNL_CNT, 0) > 0 AND C.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND F.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND F.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' ) IA , TB_DP_PROD IB WHERE IA.PART_PROD_ID = IB.PROD_ID

SELECT /* BannerMapper.xml, searchBrandShopProdList, tae hee Lee, 2014-02-21 */ D.PROD_ID AS PART_PROD_ID , D.TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP A , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_DVC B , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_SELLER C , TB_DP_PROD D WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.BRAND_SHOP_NO = B.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND A.BRAND_SHOP_NO = C.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND C.MBR_NO = D.SELLER_MBR_NO AND B.DVC_TYPE_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.BRAND_SHOP_NO = #{brandShopNo}

SELECT /* BannerMapper.xml, searchThemeRecommProdList, tae hee Lee, 2014-03-03 */ , A.LIST_NM , B.PART_PROD_ID , E.TOP_MENU_ID FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID , A.LIST_NM , B.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.LIST_ID = #{themeId} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(B.STD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = #{stdDt} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT ) A /* 앱가이드 테마 */ , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD C /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_PROD E /* 에피소드 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND D.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403'

SELECT /* BannerMapper.xml, searchAppGuideProdList, tae hee Lee, 2014-03-03 */ A.PART_PROD_ID , D.TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD B /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD C /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_PROD D /* 에피소드 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.PART_PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND C.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND C.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND C.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403'

SELECT /* BannerMapper.xml, getBannerProvisioing, tae hee Lee, 2014-02-21 */ COUNT(A.PROD_ID) AS PROD_CNT FROM TB_DP_PROD A , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD B , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE C , TB_CM_DEVICE D WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = D.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND B.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND (C.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR C.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
AND D.EBOOK_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND D.COMIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND (CASE WHEN (NVL(A.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND NVL(D.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN, 'N') = 'N') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) = 1
AND D.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
